Written and illustrated by:
Sarra Ben Amara

About:
The story of Maya and the magical flowers is a new and original fairy tale that tells
the tale of a brave young girl who embarks on a dangerous journey to save her
village from a powerful curse. The story is set in a magical forest filled with
enchanted creatures, and it teaches the importance of kindness, bravery, and
respecting nature. Maya's journey to retrieve the magical flowers showcases the
power of determination and the value of perseverance in the face of adversity.
Overall, this fairy tale offers a heartwarming and uplifting message that will resonate
with readers of all ages.
www.onlinetutorschool.com

Once upon a time, there was a small village in the middle of a vast, enchanted
forest. The villagers had always lived in harmony with the magical creatures that
roamed the forest, but one day, a powerful curse befell the land.

The curse caused all the plants in the forest to wither and die, and the animals
became sick and weak. The villagers soon realized that the only way to break the
curse was to find a magical flower that grew deep within the forest, but none of them
knew where to look.

One day, a young girl named Maya set out on a journey to find the flower. She
traveled deep into the forest, facing many dangers along the way. But she remained
determined to save her village and break the curse.

After many days of wandering, Maya finally stumbled upon a hidden glade filled with
the magical flowers she had been searching for. But the glade was guarded by a fierce
dragon who had been tasked with protecting the flowers.

Maya knew she had to be brave and face the dragon to retrieve the flowers. So, she
approached the dragon and spoke to him with kindness and respect. To her
surprise, the dragon was touched by Maya's gentle nature and allowed her to take
the flowers.

Maya returned to her village with the magical flowers and used them to break the
curse. The forest bloomed once again, and the animals and plants were restored to
their former glory.

From that day forward, the villagers learned to live in harmony with the forest and
its magical inhabitants. And Maya became known as a hero who saved her village
with her courage and kindness.
